title: Enhancing Business Practical Competencies: Mobile Mastery for Additive Manufacturing Design (DfAM) Capability Development

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can apply DfAM design principles (constraints/opportunities) with over 85% accuracy
Learners can propose three or more creative design solutions in problem-based tasks
Learners can enhance their self-efficacy in DfAM application by over 20% through self-assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
